original_text: A second angel followed the first one. He said, ‘God has destroyed Babylon! It is no longer a great city! It has caused people everywhere to do the same bad things as it enjoys. She is like a prostitute who makes men become drunk and have sex in a wrong way. She has caused them to turn away from God.’
korean_text: 또 다른 천사 곧 둘째가 그 뒤를 따라 말하되 무너졌도다 무너졌도다 큰 성 바벨론이여 모든 나라에게 그의 음행으로 말미암아 진노의 포도주를 먹이던 자로다 하더라

sentences.original_text: A second angel followed the first one.
sentences.korean_translation: 두 번째 천사가 첫 번째 천사를 따랐습니다.

sentences.original_text: It is no longer a great city!
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 더 이상 위대한 도시가 아닙니다!

sentences.original_text: It has caused people everywhere to do the same bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 모든 사람들이 똑같은 나쁜 일을 하도록 만들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and have sex in a wrong way.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 잘못된 방식으로 성관계를 갖게 합니다.

sentences.original_text: She has caused them to turn away from God.
